text.div:
VhDir Consent Value Set

Codes for use in defining access levels for sharing subsets of constrained content (as an example)

This value set includes codes from the following code systems:

  • Include all codes defined in http://hl7.org/fhir/uv/vhdir/CodeSystem/consent
  • Include all codes defined in http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/consentscope

name: VhDirConsent
title: VhDir Consent Value Set
description: Codes for use in defining access levels for sharing subsets of constrained content (as an example)
